title: Region bounded by sinx, cosx, and y-axis part - b

content.description: Let R be the shaded region in the first quadrant enclosed by the y-axis and the graphs of y =sin x and y =cos x , as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

topic.text: 8.11: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis
